snippet: Also, David Pogue finds that a new tablet from Samsung has too many features, and crowds of up 75,000 attending a vigil at Graceland to mark the 35th anniversary of Elvis Presley's death were greeted by two unexpected guests.
abstract: Also, David Pogue finds that a new tablet from Samsung has too many features, and crowds of up 75,000 attending a vigil at Graceland to mark the 35th anniversary of Elvis Presley's death were greeted by two unexpected guests.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Asylum for Assange, and Jay-Z's Stamp on the Nets
